title: Design Your Dream Job
description: Imagine and describe the most amazing job you can dream of.

content.intro: Let’s dream big! What would your perfect job be if you could do anything?
questions: What would your dream job be called?
Where would you work — a jungle, a spaceship, a lab?
What would you do every day at this job?
What special outfit or tools would you use?
Why do you think this job would make you happy?
